DescriptionData.Title: TAG Face Paint Regular - Black (50g)
DescriptionData.Description:
Professional Face Paint from TAG. Professional quality face paint, in regular black. Goes on smooth and lasts for hours.
Each 1.76 ounces (50 grams) TAG Paint Container is good for 100-250 applications.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Professional quality face paint, in regular BLACK
Goes on smooth and lasts for hours
Each 1.76 ounces (50 grams) TAG Paint Container is good for 100-250 applications.
